snippet.title: PilgrimAge trailer 2023
snippet.description:
As the end of the world approaches, you join the pilgrim march to reach the distant golden city in a last effort to plead for mercy with the god of mankind.

PilgrimAge is a solo-developed Souls-like game, set in a medieval world inspired by PS1 aesthetics and the Souls universe. As the in-game time expires, you will explore, collect, engage in combat, and discover different endings at the end of the world.

Follow the development at:
https://twitter.com/Lo_cecius
https://locecius.itch.io/
